mainScreen.title: Accept Bitcoin Payments
mainScreen.text: Send, Store, Exchange and Accept Cryptocurrency.

sectionHowItWorks.text: Brief description of how the app works

stepOne.subtitle: Send invoice
stepOne.text: Merchant issues an invoice in their local currency

stepTwo.subtitle: Payment
stepTwo.text: The user pays in the currency in which it is convenient for him. We take care of all the difficulties with overpayments and underpayments.

stepThree.subtitle: Broadcast
stepThree.text: Conversion and withdrawal, the merchant at any time withdraws his funds to his wallet in the currency in which he is comfortable.

advantage1.subtitle: EU Regulated
advantage1.text: We support KYC compliance for operation in regulated regions.

advantage2.subtitle: All types of crypto
advantage2.text: Bitcoin, altcoins and stable coins are supported.

advantage3.subtitle: Major Blockchains
advantage3.text: Bitcoin, Lightning Network, Liquid Network, Ethereum, Polygon,  BSC and more.

advantage4.subtitle: Free of Charge
advantage4.text: All outgoing transactions, transfers and payouts in crypto are free of charge.

pageNotFound.subtitle: Page Not Found
pageNotFound.text: sorry, the page decided to take a little break
